description: The CanRisk tool is a web interface to BOADICEA, the Breast and Ovarian Analysis of Disease Incidence and Carrier Estimation Algorithm, risk prediction model used to calculate future breast and ovarian cancer risks in women. This is the first comprehensive model that allows for reliable breast cancer risk prediction in unaffected women on the basis of mutation screening information for rare (high risk and moderate risk) breast cancer genetic susceptibility variants, common cancer genetic susceptibility variants (using polygenic risk scores), explicit family history, personal lifestyle, hormonal and reproductive risk factors, and mammographic density.
name: CanRisk
